product_catalog.description: Represents the products offered by Northwind Traders, including their categorization and supplier information for product sourcing and supply chain management.
product_catalog.base_query: SELECT p.ProductID, p.ProductName, p.QuantityPerUnit, p.UnitPrice, p.UnitsInStock, p.UnitsOnOrder, p.ReorderLevel, p.Discontinued, c.CategoryID, c.CategoryName, c.Description AS CategoryDescription, s.SupplierID, s.CompanyName AS SupplierName, s.ContactName AS SupplierContactName, s.ContactTitle AS SupplierContactTitle, s.Address AS SupplierAddress, s.City AS SupplierCity, s.Region AS SupplierRegion, s.PostalCode AS SupplierPostalCode, s.Country AS SupplierCountry, s.Phone AS SupplierPhone, s.Fax AS SupplierFax, s.HomePage AS SupplierHomePage FROM Products p LEFT JOIN Categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID LEFT JOIN Suppliers s ON p.SupplierID = s.SupplierID

quantity_per_unit.name: Quantity Per Unit
quantity_per_unit.description: Quantity of product per unit packaging

unit_price.name: Unit Price
unit_price.description: Price per unit of the product

units_in_stock.name: Units In Stock
units_in_stock.description: Current number of units available in stock

units_on_order.name: Units On Order
units_on_order.description: Number of units currently on order from suppliers

reorder_level.name: Reorder Level
reorder_level.description: Stock level at which new orders should be placed

discontinued.name: Discontinued
discontinued.description: Indicates if the product is discontinued (0 = No, 1 = Yes)

supplier_contact_name.name: Supplier Contact Name
supplier_contact_name.description: Name of the supplier's contact person

supplier_contact_title.name: Supplier Contact Title
supplier_contact_title.description: Title of the supplier's contact person

supplier_city.name: Supplier City
supplier_city.description: City where the supplier is located

supplier_region.name: Supplier Region
supplier_region.description: Region where the supplier is located

supplier_postal_code.name: Supplier Postal Code
supplier_postal_code.description: Postal code of the supplier's location

stock_status.name: Stock Status
stock_status.sql: CASE WHEN p.UnitsInStock > 0 THEN 'In Stock' ELSE 'Out of Stock' END

needs_reorder.name: Needs Reorder
needs_reorder.description: Flag indicating if product stock is at or below reorder level and not discontinued
needs_reorder.sql: CASE WHEN p.UnitsInStock <= p.ReorderLevel AND p.Discontinued = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

total_stock_value.name: Total Stock Value
total_stock_value.description: Monetary value of current stock (UnitsInStock * UnitPrice)

total_order_value.name: Total Order Value
total_order_value.description: Monetary value of units currently on order (UnitsOnOrder * UnitPrice)

category.name: Category
category.description: Category to which the product belongs

customer_management.description: Represents the customers of Northwind Traders along with their demographic classifications for sales and customer management purposes.
customer_management.base_query: SELECT c.CustomerID, c.CompanyName, c.ContactName, c.ContactTitle, c.Address, c.City, c.Region, c.PostalCode, c.Country, c.Phone, c.Fax, cd.CustomerTypeID, cd.CustomerDesc FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN CustomerCustomerDemo ccd ON c.CustomerID = ccd.CustomerID LEFT JOIN CustomerDemographics cd ON ccd.CustomerTypeID = cd.CustomerTypeID

contact_name.name: Contact Name
contact_name.description: Name of the primary contact person

contact_title.name: Contact Title
contact_title.description: Title of the primary contact person

city.name: City
city.description: City where the customer is located

postal_code.name: Postal Code
postal_code.description: Postal code of the customer's address

phone.name: Phone
phone.description: Primary phone number of the customer

customer_type_id.name: Customer Type ID
customer_type_id.description: Identifier for the customer's demographic classification

customer_description.name: Customer Description
customer_description.description: Description of the customer's demographic classification

has_demographics.name: Has Demographics
has_demographics.description: Indicates if the customer has demographic classification
has_demographics.sql: CASE WHEN cd.CustomerTypeID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

customer_demographics.name: Customer Demographics
customer_demographics.description: Demographic classifications associated with the customer

sales_orders.description: Represents customer orders with detailed order lines, sales representatives, and shipping information for sales and logistics management.
sales_orders.base_query: SELECT o.OrderID, o.CustomerID, o.EmployeeID, o.OrderDate, o.RequiredDate, o.ShippedDate, o.ShipVia, o.Freight, o.ShipName, o.ShipAddress, o.ShipCity, o.ShipRegion, o.ShipPostalCode, o.ShipCountry, od.ProductID, od.UnitPrice, od.Quantity, od.Discount, e.LastName AS EmployeeLastName, e.FirstName AS EmployeeFirstName, e.Title AS EmployeeTitle, s.CompanyName AS ShipperName, s.Phone AS ShipperPhone FROM Orders o INNER JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID LEFT JOIN Employees e ON o.EmployeeID = e.EmployeeID LEFT JOIN Shippers s ON o.ShipVia = s.ShipperID

customer_id.name: Customer ID
customer_id.description: Identifier of the customer who placed the order

employee_id.name: Sales Representative ID
employee_id.description: Identifier of the sales representative handling the order

sales_rep_name.name: Sales Representative Name
sales_rep_name.description: Full name of the sales representative

sales_rep_title.name: Sales Representative Title
sales_rep_title.description: Job title of the sales representative

order_date.name: Order Date
order_date.description: Date when the order was placed

required_date.name: Required Date
required_date.description: Date by which the order is required

shipped_date.name: Shipped Date
shipped_date.description: Date when the order was shipped

shipper_phone.name: Shipper Phone
shipper_phone.description: Contact phone number of the shipping company

freight_cost.name: Freight Cost
freight_cost.description: Cost of freight for the order

shipping_name.name: Shipping Name
shipping_name.description: Name to which the order is shipped

product_id.name: Product ID
product_id.description: Identifier of the product in the order line

unit_price.name: Unit Price
unit_price.description: Price per unit of the product

discount.name: Discount
discount.description: Discount applied on the product line (fractional)

line_total.name: Line Total
line_total.description: Total price for the order line after discount

order_total.name: Order Total
order_total.description: Total value of the order including all order lines and freight
order_total.sql: (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(od2.UnitPrice * od2.Quantity * (1 - od2.Discount)), 0) FROM [Order Details] od2 WHERE od2.OrderID = o.OrderID) + COALESCE(o.Freight, 0)

days_to_ship.name: Days to Ship
days_to_ship.description: Number of days between order date and shipped date
days_to_ship.sql: CASE WHEN o.ShippedDate IS NOT NULL AND o.OrderDate IS NOT NULL THEN JULIANDAY(o.ShippedDate) - JULIANDAY(o.OrderDate) ELSE NULL END

is_late_shipment.name: Is Late Shipment
is_late_shipment.description: Indicates if the order was shipped after the required date
is_late_shipment.sql: CASE WHEN o.ShippedDate IS NOT NULL AND o.RequiredDate IS NOT NULL AND o.ShippedDate > o.RequiredDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

shipper.name: Shipper
shipper.description: Shipping company handling the order delivery

order_details.name: Order Details
order_details.description: Detailed products and quantities in the order

sales_force.description: Represents the employees involved in sales activities and their assigned sales territories, including territory and region details.
sales_force.base_query: SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.LastName, e.FirstName, e.Title, e.TitleOfCourtesy, e.BirthDate, e.HireDate, e.Address, e.City, e.Region AS EmployeeRegion, e.PostalCode, e.Country, e.HomePhone, e.Extension, e.Notes, e.ReportsTo, e.PhotoPath, et.TerritoryID, t.TerritoryDescription, r.RegionID, r.RegionDescription FROM Employees e LEFT JOIN EmployeeTerritories et ON e.EmployeeID = et.EmployeeID LEFT JOIN Territories t ON et.TerritoryID = t.TerritoryID LEFT JOIN Regions r ON t.RegionID = r.RegionID

full_name.name: Full Name
full_name.description: Concatenation of employee's courtesy title, first name, and last name

hire_date.name: Hire Date
hire_date.description: Date when the employee was hired

city.name: City
city.description: City where the employee is located

employee_region.name: Employee Region
employee_region.description: Region as recorded in employee's address

reports_to.name: Reports To Employee ID
reports_to.description: Employee ID of the manager this employee reports to

territory_id.name: Territory ID
territory_id.description: Identifier of the sales territory assigned to the employee

region_id.name: Region ID
region_id.description: Identifier of the region associated with the territory

region_description.name: Region Description
region_description.description: Description of the region associated with the territory

tenure_years.name: Tenure (Years)
tenure_years.description: Number of full years the employee has been hired
tenure_years.sql: CASE WHEN e.HireDate IS NOT NULL THEN CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(e.HireDate)) / 365.25 AS INTEGER) ELSE NULL END

territory_count.name: Number of Territories
territory_count.description: Count of distinct territories assigned to the employee
territory_count.sql: (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT et2.TerritoryID) FROM EmployeeTerritories et2 WHERE et2.EmployeeID = e.EmployeeID)

manager.name: Manager
manager.description: Employee who is the manager of this employee

territories.name: Assigned Territories
territories.description: Sales territories assigned to the employee

logistics_partners.description: Represents the shipping companies used by Northwind Traders to deliver orders internationally.
logistics_partners.base_query: SELECT s.ShipperID, s.CompanyName, s.Phone FROM Shippers s

shipper_id.name: Shipper ID
shipper_id.description: Unique identifier for each shipping company

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Contact phone number of the shipping company

total_orders_shipped.name: Total Orders Shipped
total_orders_shipped.description: Total number of orders shipped by this shipping company
total_orders_shipped.sql: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Orders o WHERE o.ShipVia = s.ShipperID)

orders.name: Orders
orders.description: Orders shipped by this logistics partner

suppliers.description: Represents the companies that supply products to Northwind Traders, supporting product sourcing and supply chain management.
suppliers.base_query: SELECT s.SupplierID, s.CompanyName, s.ContactName, s.ContactTitle, s.Address, s.City, s.Region, s.PostalCode, s.Country, s.Phone, s.Fax, s.HomePage FROM Suppliers s

contact_name.name: Contact Name
contact_name.description: Name of the primary contact person at the supplier

contact_title.name: Contact Title
contact_title.description: Job title of the contact person

city.name: City
city.description: City where the supplier is located

region.name: Region
region.description: Region or state of the supplier

postal_code.name: Postal Code
postal_code.description: Postal or ZIP code of the supplier

country.name: Country
country.description: Country where the supplier is based

phone.name: Phone Number
phone.description: Primary phone number of the supplier

fax.name: Fax Number
fax.description: Fax number of the supplier, if available

contact_full.name: Full Contact Info
contact_full.description: Concatenated contact name and title for quick reference
contact_full.sql: TRIM(COALESCE(s.ContactName, '') || CASE WHEN s.ContactTitle IS NOT NULL AND s.ContactTitle <> '' THEN ' (' || s.ContactTitle || ')' ELSE '' END)
